profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional full-stack development, web application building, and data analysis using standard programming languages and databases. While it mentions working with data analysts and potentially using technology to help clients transform, there is no mention of machine learning, generative AI, LLMs, or related advanced AI modeling techniques. The role appears to be a standard software development position rather than a specialized AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions working on complex transformation projects, understanding the impact of new laws and regulations, and helping clients transform to a future-proof and agile business model. It also states the expectation to 'learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product'.
job_tasks.phrase: understand the impact of new laws and regulations (e.g. CSRD, ESEF), reporting requirements and changes in the IT landscape play a crucial role

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working closely with clients to make optimal use of technology during complex processes and stimulating innovation.
job_tasks.phrase: work closely with our clients to make optimal use of technology during these complex processes (e.g. during an IPO, merger or acquisition), stimulate innovation

job_tasks.justification: The job requires understanding business needs to gather requirements for software solutions.
The role involves understanding the business context of the projects to deliver relevant solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working on Data Analysis projects which implies data handling and preparation.
The core of the role is building software solutions, including internal tools and external client projects.
The role involves defining the architecture for software solutions.
The job includes managing the development and deployment of software solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: manage the development and deployment of Software solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building web applications.
The job requires working as part of Agile development teams, a common practice in software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Working as part of Agile development teams

job_tasks.justification: The role involves managing the development and deployment of software solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Managing the development and deployment of software solutions

job_tasks.justification: The job requires completing documentation tasks, which is a standard part of the software development lifecycle.
The description mentions managing the deployment of software solutions, which falls under operations engineering.
The role involves managing the deployment of software solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: work with in multidisciplinary teams (including deals & technical accounting experts, ERP & technology specialists, software developers and data analysts)
Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development of various consulting skills
continuously invest globally in the development of our team members, our skills and the innovative tools that we use
